EmailTemplate.name: Post-Class Follow-up Sales
EmailTemplate.subject: Follow-up to Effective Selling with Salesforce.com
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
Thank you for attending Effective Selling with Salesforce.com. The purpose of this email is to provide you with the documents reviewed during training, instructions on how to complete your Application Assessment (Test) and guidance on the next steps in your training roadmap.
Several links are provided below. In order to download the appropriate document, or complete the appropriate evaluation, please click on the link or copy/paste it into your browser.
The presentation reviewed during your classroom training session included overviews on the use of many Salesforce.com features as well as step-action instructions to help you being using these features. You may download the training presentation here:
https://na1.salesforce.com/sfc/p/30000000lp1bvLnimpqmRI6SNwNoMjcuQrNe3a4=
As we continue to learn together, it is important that we assess the skills which each trainee has developed. Please take 15-30 minutes to complete this Application Assessment regarding the materials covered in your Training Roadmap up to, and including your classroom training session:
http://hslearning.intra.sears.com/HSL/Training/Salesforce-Training.aspx (select course 3070)
Looking ahead, please be aware of and ready for the following items on the Account Manager Training Roadmapo Complete your Data Accuracy Review (and mark your task as completed)
o Complete your Application Assessment within 1 week of classroom training
o Attend your classroom training district debrief conference call to occur within 2 weeks of classroom training (DM led)
o Attend your classroom training regional debriefs webmeeting to occur within 3 weeks of classroom training (Implementation team led)
Thank you for having the courage to change your habits. The impact we are making to our business will be profound.
Best,
{!User.FirstName}
